    About Swifty

    Swifty is the next generation of static site generator.

    It makes it really simple to create a full website that loads pages almost instantly.

    Quick Start

    1. Install Swifty:

    npm install swifty

    2. Start a new project:

    npm swifty

    3. Add some more pages to the 'pages' folder (just write them in Markdown).

    4. Start the server:

    npm start

    Visit localhost:3000 to see your site in action.

    5. Learn More about all the other features, including layouts, partials and front-matter configuration.

    This site was built with Swifty, the super speedy static site generator.
